doc.title: If Not Now, When?
doc.plot: Daniel is another one of those kids who, like thousands dreams of becoming a professional footballer. His ambition and talent will allow him to escape the unstoppable urban violence. The film depicts a current ethnic perspective of youth culture, which is portrayed by the every day interactions between Daniel and his peers. The film exposes the shocking truth and impact of knife crime. If Not Now, When? highlights the damning truth of urban life for many of it teenage inhabitants.
